summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ITC Survey application. All backend APIs pass (19/19 tests). Frontend cascading dropdowns, dynamic question loading, conditional inputs, survey submission, admin login, and question management all working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed bug in server.py: delete_question and update_question endpoints were catching HTTPException in generic except block, causing 500 errors instead of proper 404 responses. Added 'except HTTPException: raise' before generic exception handler.
seed_data_creation: Used existing seeded data from MongoDB: 7 survey questions, 1600 outlet records, survey responses
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features verified working: cascading dropdowns (Branch→Section→WD Destination→DMS ID), dynamic questions from /api/admin/questions, single-select radio buttons (Q1-4), multi-select checkboxes (Q5-7), conditional text inputs for Q5 'Others' and Q7 'Relationship issue', survey submission, admin login (vickyvikas@itc.in/vickyvikas), response viewing with filters, export to Excel, question CRUD management.

survey_step1_cascading_dropdowns.details: Branch→Section→WD Destination→DMS ID cascade working correctly

single_select_questions.details: Q1-Q4 render as radio buttons, selection works

multi_select_questions.details: Q5-Q7 render as checkboxes, multiple selection works

conditional_text_input_q5_others.details: Text input appears when 'Others' selected in Q5

conditional_text_input_q7_relationship.details: Text input appears when 'Relationship issue' selected in Q7

survey_submission.details: Survey submits successfully, success page displays

admin_response_viewing.details: Responses table with filters and stats display correctly

admin_question_management.details: All 7 questions shown with edit/delete buttons, add question available
